name: DoomFish
description:
A little game about a badass fish that wants to take revenge on trash for making it blind. That is the reason you move weird. Not because I don't know how to rotate sprites :)

Controls:

You move with WASD or the Arrow Keys,

Left Click is shoot

 Also the cutscenes play automatically.

There are also three "Endings":
  1. You save the ocean (get a score of 200)
  2. You fail (loose all your HP)
  3. You run out of time (wait for the timer to go down to 0)
Other:

This was a submission for the SeaJam in support of TeamSeas. Please go and check out all of the other sumbissions and don't forget to support TeamSeas if you can.

I made this in Construct 2 over the course of 3 to 5 days.

Thank you for playing :)
